section.title: Test Campaign Details
section.p: This form shows the details for the currently selected test campaign

section.title: Test Cases
section.p: This table lists all the test cases associated with the currently selected test campaign. Click on a 'Test Case ID' link to view that test case.
Table results can be filtered by entering a search term in the filter box at the top of each column. Filter options are: '=': equal to, '!=': not equal to, and '~': contains

section.title: Icons Description
section.p: 'Edit': Enables editing of the current test campaign.
'Lock': Locks the contents and test case versions in the current test campaign.
'Copy': Makes a copy of the current test campaign.
'Test Campaign Executions': Navigates to test campaign executions for the current test campaign.

section.title: Pass Rate
section.p: Displays a stacked progress bar of test execution results. By hovering over each result bar a tooltip will display more information
